params.name: inputs
params.description: Shape as (batch_size, num_tokens, input_size).Tensor containing the features of the input sequence.

params.name: sequence_length
params.description: Shape as (batch_size).The sequence length of the input sequence.

return.description: Returns tensor output, the hidden state at the last time step for every layer.Its data type is float and its shape is [batch_size, hidden_size].
